remarks: Cancellation law for vector subtraction.  ( ~ nnncan1 analog.) (Contributed by NM, 7-Mar-2008.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nvmf.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
nvmf.3 $e |- M = ( -v ` U ) $.
nvnnncan1 $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( A M B ) M ( A M C ) ) = ( C M B ) ) $.
